description:

description:

description:

description:

iself, but if you had someone to mix it for you...

A wide basket, intended to hold a large plant.

description:
Straw symbol that can turn girls to scarecrows.

description:

description:
A magic wand left with no power.
Go to a Restoration Point to recharge it.

description:
Grants the spells "Thunder," "Trance," "Soulsever,"

description:

description:

description:
